import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import ApiFunctions from "../ApiFunctions"; import Header from "./Header"; import Footer from "./Footer"; import { useHistory } from "react-router"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet"; import emergency from '../images/emergency.png'; import healthcare from '../images/healthcare.png'; import doctor from '../images/doctor.png'; import services from '../images/services.png'; import useToken from "./admin/useToken"; import dr2 from '../images/hospital1.jpg'; function Doctor() { const history = useHistory(); const token = useToken(); if (!token.token) { history.push('/login'); } var user_role = ""; user_role = token.token.data.user_role; const [list, setList] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { ApiFunctions.viewHospital(null,{ headers:{ 'Authorization': token.token.token, } }).then(res => { var data = res.data.data; setList(data) }) }, []); return (

We put patients and their wellbeing above all

We are trusted by hundreds of thousands of people for the quality of our service.

Our Hospitals

{list.map((data) => { return(

{data.name}

{data.email} {data.contact_number} View Doctors
)})}

We are the best for a reason

There are a million reasons why we are trusted

Emergency Care

24X7 emergency care and doctors available on duty round the clock to ensure that medical care to no patient is delayed and lives are saved well in time.

Advanced Healthcare

We have adapted to a highly digitalized medical care infrastructure from robotic surgeries to the most advanced pathological labs for best healthcare experience.

Expert Doctors

We have the most accomplished doctors in the country leading different departments and that gives great confidence and optimism to patients who come to us.

Anytime Access

Customers can access their electronic health records anytime, book appointments at any time and upload their reports in real time through our digital channels.

); } export default Doctor;
